A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Plot is a hot mess with way too much forced humour. Additionally there were some cringeworthy scenes\, scenes that don't make sense and underutilized characters.  Visually It was amazing\, but not enough to save itself from the awful director that is Rian Johnson. It honestly makes The Phantom Menace and Stack of the Clones look like pretty good films. Let's see if JJ can save the series with the next one\, here's hoping.
